name: Alara Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were extremely disappointed in our overall stay at this hotel. We actually stayed here on 2 separate nights a week apart. The first night we checked in we had a great staff member checking us in who gave us directions to restaurants and recommended some good ones. The rooms have all been renovated. (Refer to their website not Expedia etc as those pictures are not accurate at all) The rooms were decently done but it's a no frills Motor Inn that we found to be extremely expensive for what you got. People start leaving at 5am and don't seem to be very courteous to other travellers....since the parking lot is right outside your door you hear EVERYTHING. Doors slamming, people talking, cars starting and especially TV's from the rooms closest to you. We were going to stay somewhere else for our second night but didn't have the time to find anything before we got back in Mackay so we ended up here again. This time however we had the RUDEST staff member (Karen) that we've ever encountered. That put us completely over the edge regarding this hotel and I would NEVER recommend this place to anyone. There are lots of Motor Inns in Mackay on the same street....pick a different one.
reviews.title: Stay Elsewhere!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Alara Motel for one night while on a driving holiday. We arrived on a particularly hot day (after a particularly hot and dull drive from Rockhampton) and were pleased to find our room was ready for us despite our early arrival.
reviews.title: Clean, tidy but a bit out of town

description: The Alara Motor Inn staff are dedicated to providing you with exceptional, friendly service ensuring you an enjoyable and comfortable stay. The Alara Motor Inn is a beautifully presented 4 star hotel, located 3 minutes drive from the heart of Mackay on the main thoroughfare of Nebo Road (Highway 1). There are 41 ground floor units at the Alara Motor Inn. Every room features a queen size bed and air conditioning, remote control 32" Plasma TV as well as cable television and secure broadband connection points.For your convenience each room has a hair dryer, iron and ironing board as well as tea and coffee making facilities, minibar and undercover, offstreet parking. For your comfort, all of our units are non-smoking.The onsite pool is available for guest use all year round. Our Restaurant is open Monday - Thursday evenings and Monday - Friday mornings. We have a charge back facility organised with another resort 300m down the road for meal service outside our restaurant opening hours. If you would like any information on different room types or facilities please don't hesitate to contact us.
